00014 #ifndef __MEMCACHED_CPPWRAP_H__

00021 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00022 #include <DataBuffer.h>
00023 #include <MC2Exception.h>

00026 namespace Memcached {
00027 
00029 class MemcachedException : public MC2Exception {
00030 public:
00031    MemcachedException( const MC2String& what );
00032 };
00033 
00045 class Cache {
00046 public:
00053    Cache( const MC2String& hosts );
00054    
00055    virtual ~Cache();
00056

00066              const void* data,
00067              size_t dataLength,
00068              time_t expiration = 0,
00069              uint32_t flags = 0 );
00070    
00079    void set( const MC2String& key, 
00080              const void* data, 
00081              size_t dataLength,
00082              time_t expiration = 0,
00083              uint32_t flags = 0 );
00084 
00091    std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<void>, size_t> get( const MC2String& key, 
00092                                                    uint32_t* flags = NULL );
00093 
00098    void remove( const MC2String& key );
00099    
00103    void flush();
00104 
00105 private:
00106    struct Implementation;

00109 
00119 template<typename T>
00120 class SimpleNoThrowCache {
00121 public:
00122    
00131    SimpleNoThrowCache( const MC2String& hosts,
00132                        const MC2String& prefix = MC2String() ) 
00133    : m_cache( NULL ), m_prefix( prefix ), m_needsToFlush( false ) {
00134       try {
00135          m_cache.reset( new Cache( hosts ) );
00136       } catch ( const MemcachedException& e ) {
00137          mc2log << error << "Failed to create Memcached::Cache object" << endl;
00138          mc2log << error << e.what() << endl;
00139       }
00140    }
00141    
00142    virtual ~SimpleNoThrowCache() {}
00143    
00152    void add( const MC2String& key,
00153              const T& value,
00154              time_t expiration = 0,
00155              uint32_t flags = 0 ) {
00156       flushIfNeeded();
00157       if ( !m_needsToFlush && m_cache.get() != NULL ) {
00158          DataBuffer buffer( value.getDataBuffer() );
00159          
00160          try {
00161             m_cache->add( m_prefix+key, 
00162                           buffer.getBufferAddress(), 
00163                           buffer.getBufferSize(), 
00164                           expiration, 
00165                           flags );
00166          } catch ( const MemcachedException& e ) {
00167             // silently ignore
00168          }
00169       }
00170    }
00171    
00180    void set( const MC2String& key, 
00181              const T& value,
00182              time_t expiration = 0,
00183              uint32_t flags = 0 ) {
00184       flushIfNeeded();
00185       if ( !m_needsToFlush && m_cache.get() != NULL ) {
00186          DataBuffer buffer( value.getDataBuffer() );
00187          
00188          try {
00189             m_cache->set( m_prefix+key, 
00190                           buffer.getBufferAddress(), 
00191                           buffer.getBufferSize(), 
00192                           expiration, 
00193                           flags );
00194          } catch ( const MemcachedException& e ) {
00195             // silently ignore
00196          }
00197       }
00198    }
00199    
00208    bool get( const MC2String& key,
00209              T& value,
00210              uint32_t* flags = NULL ) {
00211       flushIfNeeded();
00212       if ( !m_needsToFlush && m_cache.get() != NULL ) {
00213          try {
00214             std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<void>, size_t> result = 
00215                m_cache->get( m_prefix+key, flags );
00216 
00217             DataBuffer buffer( (byte*)result.first.get(), result.second );
00218             value.load( buffer );
00219             return true;
00220          } catch ( MemcachedException& e ) {
00221             // treat as if there's no such element
00222          }
00223       }
00224       return false;
00225    }
00226    
00232    void remove( const MC2String& key ) {
00233       flushIfNeeded();
00234       if ( !m_needsToFlush && m_cache.get() != NULL ) {
00235          try {
00236             m_cache->remove( m_prefix+key );
00237          } catch ( MemcachedException& e ) {
00238             // silently ignore
00239          }
00240       }
00241    }
00242    
00246    void flush() {
00247       if ( m_cache.get() != NULL ) {
00248          try {
00249             m_cache->flush();
00250             m_needsToFlush = false;
00251          } catch ( MemcachedException& e ) {
00252             // Can't trust the contents of the cache until
00253             // it has been flushed...
00254             m_needsToFlush = true;
00255 
00256             mc2log << error << "Failed to flush memcached" << endl;
00257             mc2log << error << e.what() << endl;
00258          }
00259       }
00260    }
00261    
00262 private:
00263 
00264    void flushIfNeeded() {
00265       if ( m_needsToFlush ) {
00266          flush();
00267       }
00268    }
00269 
00270    std::auto_ptr<Cache> m_cache;  
00271    MC2String m_prefix;            
00272    bool m_needsToFlush;           
00273 };
00274 
00275 }
